channel.title: Posts on Pradyumn Goel's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Pradyumn Goel's Website

item.title: Asteroid Shooter, An easy to play game in which you have to dodge and blast asteroids!
item.description: This is a game in which you must dodge asteroids and blast them using your bullets, you dont have unlimited bullets and need to collect bullet backages. To test it out, visit here

item.title: Letter Arranger, my first game in javascript
item.description: This is a simple game in which you have to order a generated set of alphabets in alphabetical order To test it out, visit here

item.title: Republic day special, A project I made for India's republic day
item.description: This is a project I made to celebrate India’s republic day To check it out, visit here

item.title: School Jumper, A chrome dino game based game
item.description: This is a game in which you must jump in time to avoid failing in school exams, you get bombs every few seconds and start off with 3 bombs. Use them wisely ;) To test it out, visit here

item.title: The Glitch
item.description: A story about a universal glitch… To check it out, visit here

item.title: Getting Prestige 1 YBA
item.description: I just prestiged from pres 0 to pres 1 Yo I just got prestige 1 in YBA Roblox and I can now enter colloseum :D I can do 2v2 and 1v1 I also completed the storyline and am rn lvl 30 My plan to get pres 2 is: Dopey quest until lvl 35 => Dio quest until lvl 40 => prestige Well my current stats are => Stand: d4c Prestige: 1
